title: Mile High Magic (2014)
overview: Documentarian Karen Cruz profiles eight key players in the Magic: The Gathering scene on its twentieth anniversary in Denver, CO. One of the original fantasy collective card games, Magic has millions of players worldwide and is considered one of the most successful card games of all time.
storyline: Magic: The Gathering is a fantasy collectible card game with a twenty year history, and an even more unique subculture. Eight players are profiled in this film about the ups and downs, struggles and successes of Magic players in Denver, CO, all vying for the title of Colorado State Champion.
